QuestData.Title: Behind the Battlefront
QuestData.Description: This battlefront has been undermanned and unsupplied for too long during my absence in Kun-Lai. We need to get things back in order here before we can pick up the trail of the Sha of Hatred.$B$BTaoshi is my best. I've sent her north to investigate rumors of mantid that have somehow made it through the battlefront. I need someone I can trust to get out there and work with her to plug any holes in our defenses.$B$BIf my reports on you are correct, I can trust you with this, right $c?
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Taoshi at Dampsoil Burrow.
QuestData.RewardText: You look capable. Taran knows to send me the best. I like that.
